thread.title: ACLU Asks Judge to Order Return of Those Removed Under Travel Ban - WSJ

author: Nicole Hong
title: ACLU Asks Judge to Order Return of Those Removed Under Travel Ban - WSJ
text:
ACLU Asks Judge to Order Return of Those Removed Under Travel Ban Immigration advocates also repeat request for government to give full list of detained individuals By Google+ Feb. 7, 2017 6:24 p.m. ET 
Immigration lawyers asked a Brooklyn federal judge on Tuesday to order the return to the U.S. of all individuals who were deported under President Donald Trumpâ€™s travel ban, and to compel the government to produce a list of every individual detained under the executive order. 
That list had been ordered by U.S. District Judge Ann Donnelly on Jan. 28, the day after the executive order was signed. She also was the first judge to issue a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
